password_regex.description: 密码强度策略的正则表达式。

password_regex_description.example: The password must contain at least two of the following character types: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters, and be a length between 6 and 32.

name: KeystoneShowSecurityCompliance

get.description:
该接口可以用于查询账号密码强度策略,查询结果包括密码强度策略的正则表达式及其描述。

该接口可以使用全局区域的Endpoint和其他区域的Endpoint调用。IAM的Endpoint请参见:[地区和终端节点](https://developer.huaweicloud.com/endpoint?IAM)。

parameters.description: URL中domain_id所对应账号中IAM用户的token(无需特殊权限)。
parameters.name: X-Auth-Token

parameters.description: 待查询的账号ID,获取方式请参见:[获取账号、IAM用户、项目、用户组、委托的名称和ID](https://support.huaweicloud.com/api-iam/iam_17_0002.html)。
parameters.name: domain_id

security_compliance.password_regex_description: The password must contain at least two of the following character types: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters, and be a length between 6 and 32.

get.summary: 查询账号密码强度策略
get.x-name: 查询账号密码强度策略

summary: 查询账号密码强度策略
